questions.question_text: Prior to engaging a vendor on an RFI, which of the following documents protects the company's interests?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
The answer is A. NDA. An NDA is a non-disclosure agreement. This document protects the company's interests by ensuring that the vendor does not disclose any confidential information about the company.

Selected Answer: A
The Answer a is A

questions.question_text: In which of the following organizational structures would a project manager have the MOST authority?
questions.answer_description: Reference: Kim Heldman, CompTIA Project+ Study Guide, 2nd Edition, Sybex, Indianapolis, 2017, p. 57

questions.question_text: A company is starting a new project. There are a few departments that do not agree with the deliverables and have gone to the steering committee to explain their position. Which of the following stakeholders is MOST responsible for defending the project?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
The project sponsor is the champion of the project

Selected Answer: A
Answer is project sponsor

Selected Answer: C
Matrix. Together, they decide. In a functional organization.

questions.question_text: Joe, a team member, is dissatisfied with his assigned project tasks, and he communicates this to his manager. His manager arranges a meeting with the project manager. Together, they decide Joe needs additional training to be able to execute the assigned project tasks. Which of the following is the company's organizational structure?

In a multinational project, the project manager notices team members from a specific region frequently join meetings five minutes late. When the project manager attempts to resolve the issue, the functional manager is not concerned. This is an example of:

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Answer is A due to multinational

Selected Answer: A
A make sense for multinationals

Selected Answer: A
It is A.
